long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
DevOpsCenter Plus is a Salesforce enhancement tool designed to overcome the limitations of Salesforce's DevOpsCenter. It provides features like Scratch Org creation, sandbox management, easy pull request reviews, reviewer assignment, and a simple CI/CD pipeline setup using GitHub Actions. It also includes code formatting with Prettier and security checks via Salesforce Code Analyzer. Expected release in mid-October 2024

Install and Setup Manual here:
https://drive.google.com/file/d/1bkL0E2baHMZPcSsqTJQYcrDOhf9bxZNu/view

Demo & Functions List: https://note.com/furucrm/n/n9af12efd1824
